text: The period of Secretariat for Coordinating Reconciliation Mechanisms has been extended until 31st March 2019.The above Secretariat was established in 2015 for a period of two years for undertaking reconciliation related tasks.The proposal made by Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe, to extend its period, considering the importance of implanting a program for making aware the general public on reconciliation, was approved by the Cabinet of Ministers this week.
title: Period of Secretariat for Coordinating Reconciliation Mechanisms extended
